title: F1DB
description: F1DB Seasons Engine Manufacturers JSON Schema

engineManufacturerId.description: The identifier of the engine manufacturer.

positionNumber.description: The numerical position of the engine manufacturer in the season standings.

positionText.description: The textual representation of the engine manufacturer's position in the season standings, including special statuses.

bestStartingGridPosition.description: The best starting grid position achieved by the engine manufacturer during the season.

bestRaceResult.description: The best finishing position achieved by the engine manufacturer during the season.

totalRaceEntries.description: The total number of races entered by the engine manufacturer during the season.

totalRaceStarts.description: The total number of races started by the engine manufacturer during the season.

totalRaceWins.description: The total number of races won by the engine manufacturer during the season.

totalRaceLaps.description: The total number of laps completed by the engine manufacturer during the season.

totalPodiums.description: The total number of podium finishes achieved by the engine manufacturer during the season.

totalPodiumRaces.description: The total number of races in which the engine manufacturer finished on the podium during the season.

totalPoints.description: The total number of points accumulated by the engine manufacturer during the season.

totalPolePositions.description: The total number of pole positions achieved by the engine manufacturer during the season.

totalFastestLaps.description: The total number of fastest laps set by the engine manufacturer during the season.
